attributes.action: A vote to be held on the potenital agreement of leaving the European Union.
attributes.additional_details: The British public were sold a false pretence of a clear future, when unfortunately the details of said agreement are unclear. We strongly believe that the £350m that was premised by Boris Johnson and other 'vote leavers' was a wild plea and inaccurate plea to influence the British public. While free business trading was dismissed, attention was drawn to the improbable and humanitarianly refugee situation. Tell us what it really means; please, for the future of the current generation.
attributes.background: On June 24th 2016, our country decided to vote to leave the European Union. As a nation, we should get our say and our vote to agree the final terms that have been put forward by the UK Government.
